Class Vitals

java.lang.Object
care.eka.vitals.Vitals
public class Vitals extends Object
Client for interacting with Eka Care Vitals API.

  • Method Details

    • updateVitals

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode updateVitals(String txnId, List<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> vitalsData) throws IOException
      Update patient vitals.
      Parameters:
      txnId - Transaction ID for the vitals update
      vitalsData - List of vital records to update
      Returns:
      Response indicating success or failure
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during the request Example: 
       EkaCareClient client = new EkaCareClient("your_id", "your_secret");
 JsonNode heartRate = client.getVitals().createHeartRateVital(75, "2023-01-01T12:00:00");
 JsonNode bloodGlucose = client.getVitals().createBloodGlucoseVital(120, "2023-01-01T08:00:00", "fasting");
 List<JsonNode> vitals = List.of(heartRate, bloodGlucose);
 JsonNode response = client.getVitals().updateVitals("txn123", vitals);

    • createHeartRateVital

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode createHeartRateVital(float value, String measuredAt, String unit)
      Create a heart rate vital record.
      Parameters:
      value - Heart rate value
      measuredAt - Timestamp of measurement (ISO format)
      unit - Unit of measurement
      Returns:
      Vital record ready for submission Example: 
       EkaCareClient client = new EkaCareClient("your_id", "your_secret");
 JsonNode heartRate = client.getVitals().createHeartRateVital(75, "2023-01-01T12:00:00");

    • createHeartRateVital

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode createHeartRateVital(float value, String measuredAt)
      Create a heart rate vital record with default unit.
      Parameters:
      value - Heart rate value
      measuredAt - Timestamp of measurement (ISO format)
      Returns:
      Vital record ready for submission

    • createBloodGlucoseVital

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode createBloodGlucoseVital(float value, String measuredAt, String glucoseType, String unit)
      Create a blood glucose vital record.
      Parameters:
      value - Blood glucose value
      measuredAt - Timestamp of measurement (ISO format)
      glucoseType - Type of glucose measurement (random, fasting, after_food)
      unit - Unit of measurement
      Returns:
      Vital record ready for submission Example: 
       EkaCareClient client = new EkaCareClient("your_id", "your_secret");
 JsonNode glucose = client.getVitals().createBloodGlucoseVital(120, "2023-01-01T08:00:00", "fasting", "mg/dL");

    • createBloodGlucoseVital

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode createBloodGlucoseVital(float value, String measuredAt, String glucoseType)
      Create a blood glucose vital record with default unit.
      Parameters:
      value - Blood glucose value
      measuredAt - Timestamp of measurement (ISO format)
      glucoseType - Type of glucose measurement (random, fasting, after_food)
      Returns:
      Vital record ready for submission

    • createBloodOxygenVital

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode createBloodOxygenVital(float value, String measuredAt, String unit)
      Create a blood oxygen (SpO2) vital record.
      Parameters:
      value - Blood oxygen saturation value
      measuredAt - Timestamp of measurement (ISO format)
      unit - Unit of measurement
      Returns:
      Vital record ready for submission Example: 
       EkaCareClient client = new EkaCareClient("your_id", "your_secret");
 JsonNode oxygen = client.getVitals().createBloodOxygenVital(98, "2023-01-01T12:30:00");

    • createBloodOxygenVital

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode createBloodOxygenVital(float value, String measuredAt)
      Create a blood oxygen vital record with default unit.
      Parameters:
      value - Blood oxygen saturation value
      measuredAt - Timestamp of measurement (ISO format)
      Returns:
      Vital record ready for submission

    • createBloodPressureVital

      public List<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> createBloodPressureVital(float systolic, float diastolic, String measuredAt, String unit)
      Create blood pressure vital records (systolic and diastolic).
      Parameters:
      systolic - Systolic blood pressure value
      diastolic - Diastolic blood pressure value
      measuredAt - Timestamp of measurement (ISO format)
      unit - Unit of measurement
      Returns:
      List of vital records ready for submission Example: 
       EkaCareClient client = new EkaCareClient("your_id", "your_secret");
 List<JsonNode> bpVitals = client.getVitals().createBloodPressureVital(120, 80, "2023-01-01T14:45:00");

    • createBloodPressureVital

      public List<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> createBloodPressureVital(float systolic, float diastolic, String measuredAt)
      Create blood pressure vital records with default unit.
      Parameters:
      systolic - Systolic blood pressure value
      diastolic - Diastolic blood pressure value
      measuredAt - Timestamp of measurement (ISO format)
      Returns:
      List of vital records ready for submission
